thread.title: Draymond brutally trash talks Paul Pierce
thread.title_full: Draymond brutally trash talks Paul Pierce

author: USA TODAY
title: Draymond brutally trash talks Paul Pierce
text:
Draymond brutally trash talks Paul Pierce "You thought you was Kobe." Post to Facebook Draymond brutally trash talks Paul Pierce "You thought you was Kobe."  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/draymond-trash-talk-brutal-paul-pierce-farewell-tour-kobe-love-clippers-warriors-retire-los-angeles/   Draymond brutally trash talks Paul Pierce Alysha Tsuji , USA TODAY 12:25 a.m. ET Feb. 24, 2017 
Los Angeles Clippers forward Paul Pierce (34) speaks during media day at Clipper Training Facility in Playa Vista. (Photo: Gary A. Vasquez-USA TODAY Sports) 
Draymond Green really went at Paul Pierce toward the beginning of the Warriors-Clippers game in Oakland on Thursday night. Pierce was ruthless, and it could all be heard on the broadcast. 
Green said: 
"Chasing that farewell tour, they don't love you like that. You can't get no farewell tour. They don't love you like that â€¦ You thought you was Kobe." Draymond Green trash talking Paul Pierce with the TNT audio removed (r @AaronDerek ) pic.twitter.com/pkLOauM0pe
